404.title: 404 Error
404.content: Sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Here are some helpful links:

fusion.title: BOB Fusion: The Final Season
fusion.description: Harvest Spice by depositing into BOB apps, voting, and solving quests. Keep an eye out for special events

communityVoting.title: Community Voting
communityVoting.description: Use your Spice total to support your favourite BOB builders. Winners will be announced each week.

quest.title: Quests
quest.description: Complete a variety of on- and off-chain quests using Intract and the BOB Stake Portal to harvest an additional 62,500 Spice.

apps.title: Apps Used
apps.tooltip: The number of BOB ecosystem apps that you have harvested Spice with

quests.title: Quests Completed
quests.tooltip: The number of Intract and Galxe quests that you have completed'

referrals.title: Your Referral Code
referrals.tooltip: Share this link with a friend and when they sign up, you will receive 15% of their Spice harvest as a bonus, plus 7% of the Spice harvest of anyone they refer'

tvlFallback.title: BOB TVL Progress
tvlFallback.description: No new goal at the moment. Stay tuned for updates!

login.title: Log in to View Dashboard
login.description: Grab the final opportunity to harvest Spice. Join Season 3.

userReferralModal.title: Your Active Referrals
userReferralModal.description: Here are your active referrals and the Spice they're currently earning for you. The more they earn, the more you benefit!

multipliersModal.title: Multipliers
multipliersModal.description: Deploy high priority assets into high priority DeFi protocols to maximize your Spice harvest.
multipliersModal.disclaimer: * The multipliers displayed are subject to change based on the payout structure of the respective projects.

usedAppsModal.title: Spice Earned Across Apps
usedAppsModal.description: Below is the Spice you've harvested from apps. Keep participating to increase your future harvest!

welcomeBackModal.title: Welcome to BOB Fusion
welcomeBackModal.subtitle: The final season
welcomeBackModal.description: Fusion season 3 is your last ever chance to harvest Spice. Stake your Bitcoin for the highest multipliers and refer a friend to receive a share of all the Spice they collect.
welcomeBackModal.disclaimer: Once complete, your season 3 score will be added to seasons 1 and 2 to calculate your final Spice harvest.

one.title: Step One
one.description: Step One Bridge your assets to BOB to start harvesting Spice.
one.tip: TIP: Some assets earn more Spice than others. You can see which by clicking the “View Multipliers” button.

two.title: Step Two
two.description: Use your bridged assets in apps to maximise your Spice harvest.
two.tip: TIP: Some types of apps offer greater multipliers than others. Explore the “Hot Strategies” section to learn more.

home.title: THE FIRST HYBRID L2
home.subtitle: POWERED BY BTC & ETH
home.content: Combining liquidity and security from Bitcoin and Ethereum. Mainnet live!
home.referralCodePrompt: Need an access code? <discordLink>Join BOB on Discord</discordLink>

info.title: Ascend the ranks by gathering <highlight>SPICE</highlight>
info.content: Spice (“points”) is needed to kick-start the chain-reaction of BOB Fusion. Spice symbolizes your contributions and achievements in the BOB community.  As you harvest, you shape—and thrive in—the Bitcoin Renaissance.
info.exploreContent: Amplify your Spice harvesting by diving into and engaging with our dynamic ecosystem of applications.
info.referContent: Share your invite code with fellow explorers and claim extra Spice harvest.
info.questsContent: Dive deeper into the era of BOB Fusion and climb the ranks by completing quests (Coming soon).

partners.title: BOB Fusion Allies
partners.content: Explore campaigns of our fellow partners on the path to the Bitcoin Renaissance. Each campaign may have its own rules, benefits but also risks. Do your own research!

signUp.title: ENTER THE WORLD OF <highlight>BOB Fusion</highlight>
signUp.subtitle: Your journey starts here!
signUp.content: Connect your EVM-compatible wallet, Twitter and Discord to participate. Engage with fellow adventurers, dive deep into the lore of BOB, and stay informed on campaign progress.
signUp.twitterStep: Connect and follow BOB with your X account.

wallet.title: BOB Wallet
wallet.summary: View a summary of your wallet on the BOB network. DeFi positions may not be tracked.

alert.alex: Bridging ALEX is disabled because Alex Lab suffered an exploit involving the XLink bridge. For more information, kindly refer to this <xLink>announcement</xLink>.
